results.title: Moderate Asymptomatic Subacute Eosinophilia Secondary to Simvastatin Therapy.
results.text_hl: Moderate Asymptomatic Subacute @<m>DISEASE_Eosinophilia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004802 @@@Eosinophilia@@@ Secondary to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Therapy.

results.title: A novel anti-inflammatory role of simvastatin in a murine model of allergic asthma.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ previously sensitized to OVA, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment, either orally or i.p., reduced the total @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ cell infiltrate and @<m>DISEASE_Eosinophilia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004802 @@@eosinophilia@@@ in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid in response to inhaled OVA challenge.

citations.NLM: McKay A, Leung BP, McInnes IB, Thomson NC, Liew FY. A novel anti-inflammatory role of simvastatin in a murine model of allergic asthma. J Immunol. 2004 Mar 1;172(5):2903-8. PMID: 14978092
